propertyGroup.name: Outlets
propertyGroup.documentation: Defines the locations to which output is generated.

property.name: entities
property.documentation: The directory to which hibernate entities are generated. Please NOTE that the entity implementation classes will also be generated to this location when no operations are present on the entity with instance scope.

property.name: entity-impls
property.documentation: The location to which hibernate entity implementation files are generated. Please NOTE that the entity implementation classes will be generated to the entities outlet when no operations are present on the entity with instance scope.

property.name: hibernateVersion
property.documentation:
The version of Hibernate to use when generating. Allowable values are:
2 - Hibernate 2.x
3 - Hibernate 3.x

property.name: modelPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de dominio.

property.name: schemaDataBase
property.documentation: DataBase schema's name.

property.name: dataBaseVersion
property.documentation: DataBase version.

property.name: controllerPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de controle.

property.name: transferPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de transferencia.

property.name: controleAcessoDir
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de controle de acesso.

property.name: wsdPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de classes webService.

property.name: actionPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de transferencia.

property.name: exportPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de transferencia.

property.name: securityRealm
property.documentation: The name of the security realm (i.e. animal-quiz, other, etc). NOTE:This enables EJB security if specified.

property.name: userTypesPackage
property.documentation: Defines the package for the Hibernate user types

property.name: serviceLocatorName
property.documentation: The name to give to the generated service locator class.

property.name: hibernatePoolSize
property.documentation: Hibernate connection pool size.

property.name: hibernateJndiName
property.documentation: JNDI name bound to the SessionFactory.

property.name: xmlEncoding
property.documentation: Encoding for generated XML files.

property.name: generateEntityEqualsAndHashCode
property.documentation: Indicates whether or not a default equals and hashCode implementation should be generated.

property.name: hibernateQueryFactory
property.documentation:
Hibernate3 comes with a brand-new, ANTLR-based HQL/SQL query translator. However, it is still buggy and so in mean time use the Hibernate 2.1 query parser which is still available. Possible values are:
org.hibernate.hql.ast.ASTQueryTranslatorFactory (for the new query parser)
org.hibernate.hql.classic.ClassicQueryTranslatorFactory (for the old parser)

property.name: maxRows
property.documentation: Number of rows by page

property.name: maxPages
property.documentation: Number of pages by group

property.name: daoMethod
property.documentation: Indicates if a method is or not created on DAO class

property.name: throwsVetoException
property.documentation: Indicates if a method will throw PropetryVetoException

property.name: exportId
property.documentation: Identifica atributos que servirão para identificar a classe na exportação/importação

property.name: comment
property.documentation: Representa comentários em class, Association, AssociationEnd e Parameter

property.name: wsdStereotype
property.documentation: Indica se uma classe será transferida em webService

property.name: excludesWSDStereotype
property.documentation: Indica se um atributo ou relacao não será transferida em uma classe webService
